dct_title_s: Terrae Sanctae Tabula e Scripturae Sacrae
dct_description_sm: Copperplate.; Published after the author's death by his brother Joseph-Nicolas.; A copy identical to 1763 edition, with altered date Anno M. DCCLXXXII.; In: Bonne, Rigobert, Recueil des cartes sur la géographie ancienne. Paris, Lattré, 1783. Listed in index as plates 19 and 20, but labeled A35 and B35.; This map was probably included in Atlas moderne ou collection de cartes ... par plusieurs auteurs, Paris, Lattré, [1762-83], as plates A 35 and B 35.
